FAQ / Alpha Trion Protocols / Wave 2 / Characters /

Dirge - Feared Fighter

  1. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    Why can’t I bring Dirge back from my KO area?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 2 FAQ]
    Dirge has the ability to bring back a Blank card when KO’d, we did not want to create any “infinite loop” type scenario with the character due to cards like I Still Function and Involuntary Promotion.
  2. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    Dirge has the ability to bring back a Blank pip card, does that mean Action or Upgrade?     [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 2 FAQ]
    Yes, any battle card that is Blank is a card you may bring back from the scrap pile.
